com.corvolution.cm2

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.corvolution.cm2.Sensor

  • public class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents single connected sensor and provides appropriate methods for retrieving, setting and configuring sensor.
    Since:
    07.01.2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Suleyman Gasimov

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sensor(java.lang.String path)
      Only constructor for constructing sensor object when it is connected over usb port.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkConfiguration()
      This method allows application to check correctness of configuration before configuring sensor
      void disconnect()
      This method writes current system time and remove sensor from system
      double getBatteryVoltage()
      This method returns Battery Voltage of the connected sensor as a double primitive type
      java.lang.String getConfigurationInterfaceVersion()
      This method returns configuration interface version of the connected sensor, which defines compatibility of the sensor with the configuration set
      java.lang.String getCurrentState()
      This method returns current state of sensor.
      long getDataSize()
      This method retrieves size of measurement data from sensor
      java.lang.String getDeviceName()
      This method returns device name of the connected sensor
      java.lang.String getFirwareVersion()
      This method returns firmware version of the connected sensor
      java.util.Date getFlashDate()
      This method returns last flash date of the connected sensor
      java.lang.String getManufacturerName()
      This method returns Manufacture name of the connected sensor
      SensorConfiguration getReadConfiguration()
      This method also returns SensorConfiguration object, but for reading configuration File from sensor
      java.lang.String getSensorPath()
      This method returns path to the connected sensor
      java.lang.String getSensorSystemTime()
      This method returns system time of the sensor
      java.lang.String getSerialNumber()
      This method returns serial number of the connected sensor
      SensorConfiguration getWriteConfiguration()
      This method retrieves SensorConfiguration object for writing configuration File to the sensor
      void readConfigFile()
      This method reads config binary file from the connected sensor.
      void readEncryptedParameters(java.lang.String password)
      This method reads encrypted data from sensor with given password
      void readMeasurement(java.lang.String dest)
      This method copies measurement data from sensor to specified destination directory
      void setSensorConfiguration(SensorConfiguration config)
      This method sets SensorConfiguration config object by application
      void synchronize()
      This method writes current system time to sensor for synchronizing
      void writeConfigFile()
      This method writes configuration file to the connected sensor.Before calling this method configuration must be set
      void writeCustomFile()
      This method writes parameters to custom file for sensor configuration set by application, for example LinkId of a given measurement.
      void writeEncryptedParameters(java.lang.String password)
      This method writes encypted parameters to sensor by application.
      void writeTimeSyncFile()
      This method writes time synchronization binary file to the connected sensor, so sensor could synchronize itself after detaching

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sensor

        public Sensor(java.lang.String path)
       throws SensorNotFoundException
        Only constructor for constructing sensor object when it is connected over usb port. This constructor reads info, config, feedback and encrypted files to initialize sensor
        Parameters:
        path - to connected sensor.
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if sensor connection failed or disconnected

        This method returns current state of sensor.
        Returns:
        state as string

        Returns:
        time as string

        public java.lang.String getConfigurationInterfaceVersion()
        This method returns configuration interface version of the connected sensor, which defines compatibility of the sensor with the configuration set
        Returns:
        String

      • readMeasurement

        public void readMeasurement(java.lang.String dest)
                     throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method copies measurement data from sensor to specified destination directory
        Parameters:
        dest - where data to be copied
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if sensor connection failed or disconnected

      • readEncryptedParameters

        public void readEncryptedParameters(java.lang.String password)
                             throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method reads encrypted data from sensor with given password
        Parameters:
        password - for reading encrypted parameters
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if sensor connection failed or disconnected

      • readConfigFile

        public void readConfigFile()
                    throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method reads config binary file from the connected sensor.
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if sensor connection failed or disconnected

      • writeConfigFile

        public void writeConfigFile()
                     throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method writes configuration file to the connected sensor.Before calling this method configuration must be set
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if sensor connection failed or disconnected

      • writeTimeSyncFile

        public void writeTimeSyncFile()
                       throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method writes time synchronization binary file to the connected sensor, so sensor could synchronize itself after detaching
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if sensor connection failed or disconnected

      • getWriteConfiguration

        public SensorConfiguration getWriteConfiguration()
        This method retrieves SensorConfiguration object for writing configuration File to the sensor
        Returns:
        SensorConfiguration writeSensorConfiguration

      • getReadConfiguration

        public SensorConfiguration getReadConfiguration()
        This method also returns SensorConfiguration object, but for reading configuration File from sensor
        Returns:
        SensorConfiguration readSensorConfiguration

      • setSensorConfiguration

        public void setSensorConfiguration(SensorConfiguration config)
        This method sets SensorConfiguration config object by application
        Parameters:
        config - SensorConfiguration object for writing configuration sensor by user

      • writeEncryptedParameters

        public void writeEncryptedParameters(java.lang.String password)
                              throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method writes encypted parameters to sensor by application.
        Parameters:
        password - for encryption
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if sensor connection failed or disconnected

      • writeCustomFile

        public void writeCustomFile()
                     throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method writes parameters to custom file for sensor configuration set by application, for example LinkId of a given measurement.
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if writing data was not successfull or sensor is disconnected

      • getDataSize

        public long getDataSize()
        This method retrieves size of measurement data from sensor
        Returns:
        long. size of measurement data

      • checkConfiguration

        public boolean checkConfiguration()
        This method allows application to check correctness of configuration before configuring sensor
        Returns:
        true if configuration is compatible with a connected sensor otherwise false

      • synchronize

        public void synchronize()
                 throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method writes current system time to sensor for synchronizing
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if sensor connection failed or disconnected

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws SensorNotFoundException
        This method writes current system time and remove sensor from system
        Throws:
        SensorNotFoundException - if synchronizing or removing sensor failed
